description: Azathoth, also known as the Blind Formless Chaos That Lies Behind the Stars, the 'blind idiot god', the Daemon Sultan, or the Primal Chaos, is a little-known, inscrutable, all-powerful Outer God described as a gibbering mass of uncontrollable destructive power at the center of the universe. An utterly mindless being, Azathoth is totally unaware of the cosmos, including its own existence and worshippers.
name: Azathoth
titles: The Blind Formless Chaos That Lies Behind the Stars,
